job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As a startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and is growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of customer success innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer service tools.
     * Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and customer servicetools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI)to innovate and enhance customer service processes.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good - contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

     * Experience with setting up and maintainingcustomer service tools, such as Microsoft Dynamics Customer Services, ZenDesk Support Suite, Salesforce Service Cloud, or Freshdesk.
     * Drive to push technological boundaries in customer service, bycontinously looking for ways to leverage new technologies, such as generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT).
     * Experience with implementing, managing and improving customer service operations.
     * Interest in advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape.
     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, IT, or related fields.
     * At least 3 years working experience in customer service or success role.
     * Experience with SaaS (software as a service) solutions or B2B software solutions is a must.
     * Experience with multiple communication channels (email, chat, phone) and CRM software is a must.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

Company Information

   Syntho is a data technology organization with a strong expertise in AI-generated synthetic data, headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands. It was founded in 2020 with the goal of solving the global privacy dilemma and enable the open data economy, where data can be used and shared freely and privacy guaranteed. We offer privacy-preserving synthetic data to unlock your data and take away legitimate privacy concerns.

   As a startup, Syntho has ambitious plans in the upcoming years and is growing really fast. Want to grow your career and be at the forefront of customer success innovation? Then we're looking for you!

   Role Description
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer service tools.
     * Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and customer servicetools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI)to innovate and enhance customer service processes.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good - contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

     * Experience with setting up and maintainingcustomer service tools, such as Microsoft Dynamics Customer Services, ZenDesk Support Suite, Salesforce Service Cloud, or Freshdesk.
     * Drive to push technological boundaries in customer service, bycontinously looking for ways to leverage new technologies, such as generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT).
     * Experience with implementing, managing and improving customer service operations.
     * Interest in advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape.
     * A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment.
     * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, IT, or related fields.
     * At least 3 years working experience in customer service or success role.
     * Experience with SaaS (software as a service) solutions or B2B software solutions is a must.
     * Experience with multiple communication channels (email, chat, phone) and CRM software is a must.
     * Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities.
     * Energetic and proactive personality.
     * Professional fluency in English.

   Over het bedrijf:
   Syntho

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, service tools implementation, and operational improvements within a customer service context. While it mentions 'generative AI tooling (e.g. ChatGPT)' as a technology to innovate with, the core responsibilities and required experience are centered around customer service operations and tools (like Microsoft Dynamics, Zendesk, Salesforce) rather than the development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI models themselves. The role is primarily about leveraging existing AI tools to enhance customer service, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile's definition of focusing on the USE of AI tools to enhance productivity, rather than being a core AI development role.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations' and 'Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services', which requires understanding the business context and aligning customer service with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations

job_tasks.justification: The role requires 'Interest in advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape', indicating a need to understand the customer's business and how the product fits into it.
job_tasks.phrase: advising Syntho customers on how to optimize our solution within their operational landscape

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'implementing and managing our customer service tools' and 'Improving our customer service practices and customer service tools', which implies working with and potentially configuring or integrating software solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing and managing our customer service tools

job_tasks.justification: The role requires 'Experience with setting up and maintaining customer service tools, such as Microsoft Dynamics Customer Services, ZenDesk Support Suite, Salesforce Service Cloud, or Freshdesk', which are software applications that need to be set up and maintained.
job_tasks.phrase: setting up and maintaining customer service tools

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on 'improving our customer service practices and customer service tools' and 'Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution', which relates to the operational aspects of customer service delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving our customer service practices and customer service tools

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Experience with implementing, managing and improving customer service operations', which directly relates to the operational management of customer service.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing, managing and improving customer service operations

soft_skills.phrase: Ability to become proficient with our solution quickly and understand our products' technical capabilities
Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution
A startup mindset and ambition to work in a startup environment
